VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc East Rovers?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc East Rovers is arc {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc East Rovers?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc East Rovers is arc {Rebeccaview Dolphins}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Eddiehaven Panthers} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {East Rovers} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and Eddiehaven Panthers is {446}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between East Rovers and Rebeccaview Dolphins in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between East Rovers and Rebeccaview Dolphins is {242}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 450? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {486} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {East Rovers}, a flow of {454} from {East Rovers} to {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 146? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {32} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 164 and 387? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {182} from {Cherylberg Sharks} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}, a flow of {348} from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {Cherylberg Sharks}, a flow of {242} from {East Rovers} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from East Rovers to Cherylberg Sharks or from Rebeccaview Dolphins to Cherylberg Sharks?
NC.A: The flow from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {Cherylberg Sharks} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Rebeccaview Dolphins to Eddiehaven Panthers, from East Rovers to Eddiehaven Panthers, or from East Rovers to Rebeccaview Dolphins?
NC.A: The flow from {East Rovers} to {Eddiehaven Panthers} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Rebeccaview Dolphins}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {East Rovers} and {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Rebeccaview Dolphins, Arc East Rovers, Arc Eddiehaven Panthers, Arc Cherylberg Sharks}.
